reviews.review_msg: Could not have more positive things to say about James. I highly suggest taking classes with him as he is highly interested in his topic, well prepared, and gives great feedback for adjustments. Not in history, but would consider taking more classes if he taught!

Knows his stuff, highly approachable / available, and will always help you despite being a strict marker. Consistent communication will get you through his tough(er) research papers. Exams and assignments are fair. Don't have enough good things to say about the guy.
